attributes.action: Form a temporary national coalition govt. to govern the UK for the next 3 years.
attributes.additional_details:
The political processes in the post EU referendum period need to be handled with care so as to reflect the broad spectrum of views that decided to vote to Leave the EU. No one party has the capacity to do this. This is not the time for political parties to sort out their infighting.

We have formed a National Govt. before when we were in an extraordinary situation when extraordinary people had the courage and vision to implement extraordinary solutions.
attributes.background: The outcome of the referendum has pushed us into uncharted territory. We need a government that comprises the wisest of our politicians irrespective of their party allegiance to navigate our way through this tricky time.
